org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce

Class HadoopCounterKeyValuePair

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce.HadoopCounterKeyValuePair

  • public class HadoopCounterKeyValuePair
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents Hadoop map/reduce counter key/value pair where key is identification of Hadoop counter. A map/reduce counter key-value pair consist of instance fo HadoopCounterKey and corresponding value for the key.

    This class is immutable. Equality relation is defined on instances of this class by overriding methods Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object). Two instances are equal if and only if they have equal counter key a and value.

    Since:
    rel-3-4-0-M2
    See Also:
    HadoopJobReporter.getAllCounters(), HadoopJobReporter#getCustomCounters(), HadoopCounterKey

      Creates new instance for specified counter name, counter display name, group and value of the counter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HadoopCounterKeyValuePair

        public HadoopCounterKeyValuePair(HadoopCounterKey key,
                         long value)
        Constructs new counter key/value pair for given key and value.
        Parameters:
        key - An unambiguous identification of the counter.
        value - Value of the counter.

      • HadoopCounterKeyValuePair

        public HadoopCounterKeyValuePair(java.lang.String counterName,
                         java.lang.String counterGroupName,
                         long value)
        Creates new instance for specified counter name, group and value of the counter.
        Parameters:
        counterName - A name of the counter. Same as declared name of Hadoop API enum constant identifying the counter.
        counterGroupName - A group name of the counter. Same as fully qualified name of enum that declares Hadoop API constant that identifies the counter.
        value - A value of the counter.

      • HadoopCounterKeyValuePair

        public HadoopCounterKeyValuePair(java.lang.String counterName,
                         java.lang.String counterGroupName,
                         java.lang.String counterDiplayName,
                         long value)
        Creates new instance for specified counter name, counter display name, group and value of the counter.
        Parameters:
        counterName - A name of the counter. Same as declared name of Hadoop API enum constant identifying the counter.
        counterGroupName - A group name of the counter. Same as fully qualified name of enum that declares Hadoop API constant that identifies the counter.
        counterDiplayName - Name of the counter intended to be displayed to users.
        value - A value of the counter.
